line_1: Around his head a roasted gander whirls,
line_2: Dropping Manilla sauces on his curls:

line_1: And wantons with the wind in rapid whirls:
line_2: And lost to sight, in dying murmurs curls.

line_1: In vain the spindle from the distaff whirls,
line_2: Lengthens by fits, and as it lengthens twirls;
